info.name: Google 2021 Dark - Custom Background low Opacity
info.description: Add just a background was not enough for me, so i customized the style of the interface. If you want to offer me a beer please use the button on the top right of the screenshot above :D If you want to contact me you can use TWITTER
info.additionalInfo: You can download alot of beautiful wallpapers HERE 26/09/2021 Fix Dark Mode 30/04/2021 Fixed Color Hint 04/04/2021 Changed logo upload location 19/03/2021 Fixed white search bar and buttons Thanks Frank for the donation! 13/02/2021 Fixed because google hate us 05/07/2020 Removed an horizontal white bar (???) in the middle of the screen. 06/04/2020 Fixed because google keep changing random things. 29/02/2020 Fixed Drop-Down Menu 23/12/2019 Well, Merry Christmas Guys! I had some fee time and i received a donation (THANK YOU) so i decided to fix this theme. 14/01/2015 Fixed again. 10/12/2014 Fixed.
